SENT.plain: We report on a 13 1/2-year-old patient with Kabuki make-up syndrome and complete idiopathic precocious puberty manifested at 7 1/2 years
In addition to the other specific clinical signs, she showed hypodontia and lower lip pits, as typically seen in the Van der Woude syndrome
The significance of lower lip pits in the Kabuki make-up syndrome is discussed
